data.eml:eml: Cinetorhynchus gabonensis, a new species of hinge-beak shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Rhynchocinetidae) from the eastern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ďuriš, Zdeněk, Šobáňová, Anna, Wirtz, Peter (2019): Cinetorhynchus gabonensis, a new species of hinge-beak shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Rhynchocinetidae) from the eastern Atlantic. Zootaxa 4664 (2): 191-205, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.2.2
